tool.name: Modules Input
tool.command: { mkdir -p working_dir || echo "mkdir failed" && { cp "${pathtodata}" input.tar.gz && echo "Data Copy succeeded"; error_flag=0; } || { echo "Data Copy failed"; error_flag=1; } && { tar --strip-components=1 -xzf input.tar.gz -C working_dir && echo "Extraction succeeded"; } || { echo "Extraction failed"; error_flag=1; } && echo "After input data copying and extraction:" && ls -lh working_dir && { tar -czf input_validated.tar.gz -C working_dir . && echo "Compression succeeded"; } || { echo "Compression failed"; error_flag=1; } && echo "Main directory after input compression:" && ls -lh . && mkdir -p working_dir/genome_index_path || echo "mkdir failed" && { cp "${genomeindextar}" genome.tar.gz && echo "Genome Copy succeeded"; } || { echo "Genome Copy failed"; error_flag=1; } && { tar -xzf genome.tar.gz -C working_dir/genome_index_path && echo "Extraction succeeded"; } || { echo "Extraction failed"; error_flag=1; } && echo "After genome index copying and extraction:" && ls -lh working_dir/genome_index_path && { tar -czf genome_index_validated.tar.gz -C working_dir/genome_index_path . && echo "Compression succeeded"; } || { echo "Compression failed"; error_flag=1; } && echo "Main directory after genome index compression:" && ls -lh . && { cp "${adapterfile}" adapter.fasta && echo "Adapter Copy succeeded"; } || { echo "Adapter Copy failed"; error_flag=1; } && grep -q '^>' adapter.fasta && echo "FASTA format check passed" || { echo "Error: Adapter file is not in FASTA format (missing '>' header line)"; error_flag=1; } && { cp "${datainfo}" data.csv && echo "Data Info Copy succeeded"; } || { echo " Data Info Copy failed"; error_flag=1;} && grep -q ',' data.csv && echo "CSV comma separated format check passed" || { echo "Error: Data Info file is not in csv format (missing comma)"; error_flag=1; } && { cp "${genomeinfo}" genome.csv && echo "Genome Info Copy succeeded"; } || { echo "Genome Info Copy failed"; error_flag=1;} && grep -q ',' genome.csv && echo "CVS comma separated format check passed" || { echo "Error: Genome Info file is not in csv format (missing ',' separator)"; error_flag=1; } && { cp "${parametersinfo}" params.csv && echo "Parameters Info Copy succeeded"; } || { echo "Parameters Info Copy failed"; error_flag=1; } && grep -q ',' params.csv && { echo "Error: Parameters Info file has more than 1 column (commas found)"; } || echo "No commas found in Parameters Info file" && [ "`wc -l params.csv | awk '{print $1}'`" -lt 4 ] && { echo "Error: params.csv must contain at least 4 parameters"; error_flag=1;} || { echo "Parameters Info file: Line count check passed"; } && ls -lh . && { [ \$error_flag -eq 0 ] && echo "Input data validation success!"; }|| echo "ERROR during Input data validation!"; } 2>&1 | tee -a debug_files_upload.txt

param.name: adapterfile
param.label: Adapter File
param.help: Upload adapter FASTA file for trimming.

tool.help: This tool extracts your input text message and writes a debug log with the executed command and extracted contents.
